H0.text: Aesculus hippocastanum is the Latin name for which tree. Horse Chestnut

H1.text: Aesculus hippocastanum is the Latin name for which tree. Buckeye

H2.text: Aesculus hippocastanum is the Latin name for which tree. Sweet Chestnut

H3.text: Aesculus hippocastanum is the Latin name for which tree. Cheggying

A4.text: The most familiar member of the genus worldwide is the common horse chestnut, Aesculus hippocastanum.
